page.title: 13Going to Smallwood Hospital.
page.content: One day at my school which is St. Stephen's First School, I had an{ {accident}in the playground. I cut my face just near my right eye. I went in Mr. Sage's car to{Smallwood Hospital} where a nurse looked at my face and said a doctor would have to see it. There are no doctors full-time in the{ {casualty department.}They have to get a doctor from the{health centre}to see people who have had accidents. When he came he put a stitch in my cut and stopped it hurting. I had to go back a few days later with my mum to have the stitch out. Soon there will be a big{ {new hospital}in Redditch and our little old hospital will have to be closed down. My mum says it will be a pity because Smallwood Hospital is a friendly place and the new hospital won't be so friendly.
